Practical 2

Author

Your Name

Generate Simulated Data

set.seed(1)
x <- c(1:100)
y <- sin(x/10) + rnorm(length(x), mean = 0, sd = 0.2)

LOWESS algorithm

customLowess <- function(x, y, f) {
  #Span
  #n: number of obs
  #k: number of closest neighbors
  
  n <- length(x)
  k <- ceiling(f*n)
  
  smooth_val <- numeric(n)
  
  for (i in x) {
    #compute weights
    #absolute distance
    dist <- abs(x - x[i])
    
    #Dmax
    nearest <- order(dist)[1:k]
    dmax <- max(dist[nearest])
    
    #wj
    weights <- (1 - (dist[nearest]/dmax)^3)^3
    
    #Weighted Regression
    X <-  cbind(1, x[nearest])
    W <-  diag(weights)
    Y <- y[nearest]
    
    #estimate for beta
    beta <- solve(t(X) %*% W %*% X) %*% t(X) %*% W %*% Y
    
    #smoothe value
    smooth_val[i] <- beta[1] + beta[2] * x[i]
    
  }
  
  return(smooth_val)
  
}

Function value

#Function value 
#span - 0.2

f <- 0.2
funct_smooth_val <- customLowess(x, y, f)

R Built-In Function

R_smooth_val <- lowess(x, y, f=0.2, iter = 0)
